parameters.name: App
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description:
The transcoding template. Valid values:

*   **lld**, **lsd**, **lhd**, and **lud**: standard-quality templates.
*   **ld**, **sd**, **hd**, and **ud**: Narrowband HDâ„¢ transcoding templates.
*   You can also use custom transcoding templates.
